results_text:
Validation Report
Conforms: False
Results (8):
Constraint Violation in DatatypeConstraintComponent (http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#DatatypeConstraintComponent):
	Severity: sh:Violation
	Source Shape: [ sh:datatype xsd:decimal ; sh:message Literal("VulnerabilityScore must include a baseScore (0.0-10.0).") ; sh:minCount Literal("1", datatype=xsd:integer) ; sh:path ex:baseScore ]
	Focus Node: sec:cvss-bad
	Value Node: Literal("5.0")
	Result Path: ex:baseScore

	Focus Node: sec:tech-bad-1
	Result Path: ex:belongs_to
